name: Ikkarus and the Prince of Sin
name_original: Ikkarus and the Prince of Sin
description:
Yaoi, BxB, Visual Novel, Dating Sim, Romance, Amare, Comedy


After slaying a dragon, Ikkarus returned to his village and received an unexpected establishment as a reward: a tavern. After visiting it, he discovered the place is an utter disaster and has also accumulated a shocking debt of 50.000 gold. This could leave anyone furious but Ikkarus, a true hero, saw that as a challenge. Now, he will try to fix the place and prove to the man who gave the present that he is a natural hero. In the meantime, why not meet 3 men who can help him in his new mission and fall in love with them?

Follow Ikkarus in this Yaoi slice-of-life about making drinks, meeting unique bartenders, and hunting cute monsters.



  • 5+ hours of gameplay
  • 3 Love Partners (an orc, a demon, and a human);
  • 6 Endings (a good and a bad one for each partner);
  • 13 CGs;
  • Difficulty Selection (Easy mode for visual novel players and other focused on gameplay aspects);
  • Side Quests;
